Ein Meisterwerk!

Ich habe in den letzten Tagen erst Portal und dann gleich danach noch Portal 2 gespielt. 

Besonders die neuen Gele und die Kraftfelder sowie sehr schön gestaltete Umgebungen haben mir sehr gut gefallen. Auch den Humor fand ich noch etwas besser als in Teil 1.

Ich empfand die Story als ziemlich lang, manche Rätsel sind dann auch ziemlich knackig (für mich jedenfalls. :D), wobei ich da dann teilweise auch mehrere Anläufe gebraucht habe. 

Dazu kommt noch der Co-Op-Modus, der sich wahlweise mit Freunden oder auch mit Wildfremden spielen lässt. Beides kein Problem, man kann sich auch ohne Headset über kleinere Emoticons unterhalten, auch die Rätsel funktionieren mit einer Art Bildsprache auch sehr gut.

Und dann natürlich noch der Steam-Workshop. Ich finde es großartig, was die Community immer noch für Portal 2 entwickelt und welche Arten von Rätsel, aber auch Rennen usw. man dort finden und spielen kann. 

Alles in Allem würde ich das Spiel auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen! Wenn man allerdings nicht mal den ersten Teil gespielt hat (was er definitiv wert ist!!!), dann sollte man auf Portal 2 auch lieber verzichten. Viele Dinge aus dem zweiten Teil kommen im Teil 1 ebenfalls vor und dann ist die Story wohl für manche etwas verwirrend. ;)

Very fun game to play if you feel like sitting back and playing something more casual. Puzzles are fun and challenging, and the graphics are nice. The farther you get, the more you have to use your head. Some puzzles can seem pretty impossible at a first look, but it really makes you think. My favorite thing about this game was any conversation with Wheatley (The robot who accompanies you throughout most of the game). I liked him very much. Definitely recommend if you like to play something snatchy.

P.S. I'm in space. :D
GREAT GAME GREAT GAME 10/10 GREAT AWESOME WOW

Очень увлекательная логическая игра с разными путями прохождения комнат .Эта игра может затянуть на долгие часы , что даже когда будете хотеть кушать , то не оторветесь от компьютера . Она интересна как в одиночном режиме ,так и в мультеплеере , в который можно поиграть со случайным человеком , так и со своим другом.
Meh

Facilmente um dos melhores jogos da Steam que todos deveriam ter. Assim como no primeiro jogo, o humor está presente de maneira perfeita. Talvez a campanha single player do primeiro seja melhor, mas ainda assim este é muito bom, e ainda trás a adição da campanha cooperativa, um ótimo elemento novo que valoriza bastante o jogo. Comprem!! Jogo inteligente + bem humorado é obrigatório na biblioteca de todos.

Awesome game!
Very fun. Really enjoyed the single player mode and co-op. The co-op mode offered a unique experience from the single player mode.
This is a somewhat strategic/thought provoking game that will make you think hard. It's worth the $15, and it has coop, unlike the first release of Portal.
Wheatly

Portal 2 is a really enjoyable puzzle game which requires quite a bit of thinking in order to get to the end. The Story Mode was excellent Steven Merchant Plays Wheatly and and Ellen McClain Plays gLAD0S. Both of them do a great job of voice acting such character. The Story Mode itself was well done and was a bit difficult at times, but I managed to get through. If you want a reall challenge though, check out the Community Made Maps for the Game. Some of them are extremely hard and require you to think big. Some of these are also extremely well designed and clearly show how much people love Portal! I highly recommend this game for anyone to play if you haven't already played it!

You may not like cleaver puzzles that will make you praise your own intellect after finding a solution. You may not like hearing about lore in a whole of Valves own creation. You may not like listening to hilarious banter between a corrupt, homicidally insane AI and an Intelligence-Dampening-Sphere with a hamartia of folly-notions. But you will whole-heartedly enjoy the ending.
Jogo realmente muito bom com uma história muito bem pensada. Não recomendo para peçoas que procurem um jogo de ação, mas para jogos de puzzle esse é sem dúvidas um dos melhores.

Este juego ha marcado un antes y un despues en mi vida.
Sin duda es de los mejores juegos que he jugado nunca, una historia fascinante, escondida entre las paredes y los secretos de Aperture Science, con unos escenarios increbiles, y por no hablar de uno de los personajes principales, GlaDos que es de los mejores villanos que he visto nunca, con una personalidad fascinante que hace que la ames y la quieras estrangular al mismo tiempo.
Sin duda este juego es una obra de arte y recomendadisima para aquellos que quieran probar algo nuevo y poner a prueba su capacidad con los puzles, pues es la idea principal del juego, resolver puzles mediante el razonamiento.
Un juego 10/10.

Best.
Game.
Ever.

+ it's Valve
+ FPS combined with puzzle solving
+ awesome and fluent graphic brought by Source engine
+ awesome level design and environment design
+ awesome sound track
+ awesome voice acting
+ awesome storyline
+ more puzzle elements than Portal
+ one whole campaign featuring 2-player co-op
+ free DLCs
+ create your own test chambers, either single player or co-op
+ Steam Workshop: new chambers every day = infinite replayability
+ developer commentary with behind-the-scene stories
+ easter eggs
+ affordable price
+ the cake is still a lie
- there will (probably) never be a Portal 3
10 out of 10, masterpiece.

Recomendado para cualquiera que esté dispuesto a descubrir la historia de los personajes y a dedicarle tiempo a todos los detalles, inclusive en el modo cooperativo. Hermoso juego, uno de mis favoritos ♥

Meiner Meinung nach ein sehr cooles Spiel, in dem man immer wieder vor Aufgaben gestellt wird, um zu entkommen. Dabei ist Portal 2 deutlich länger als der Erste Teil, was das Spiel jedoch auch gut ausfüllt. Vor allem Storymäßig wird in Portal 2 viel mehr erklärt und es kommen auch neue Elemente hinzu, wodurch das Spiel auch nochmals interessanter wird. Auch der Endboss ist im Gegensatz zu dem aus dem 1. Teil etwas schwerer, jedoch auch locker im ersten Versuch machbar. Meiner Meinung nach eine Fortsetzung, die den ersten Teil übertrumpht.
Genial. Um ótimo jogo de puzzle, que te envolve em uma história deliciosa super bem elaborada. É um dos poucos games que te traz uma saudade imensa logo após de você zerá-lo.

Uma ótima sequencia, otima finalização da saga portal, trilha sonora epica, um jogo obrigatoria.

portal 2 é um jogo otimo para quem gosta de resolver puzzles, jogabilidade otima, historia boa (apesar de o jogo deixar algumas duvidas em relaçao a historia), modo coop perfeito , alem de ter graficos otimos , adoro esse jogo

Einfach Großartiges Spielprinzip, gepaart mit wundervollem Humor. Ob der passiv aggressive, weibliche Hauptcomputer der in eine Kartoffel verbannt wird oder ein an einem vorbeirollender Geschützroboter der einem erklärt: "Ich bin anders", die Dialoge und Anspielungen sind derartig witzig das ich selbst in der Erinnerung daran noch lachen muss. 

Das Prinzip der Rätselräume und deren Lösungswege sind alles andere als einfach aber an keiner Stelle unlösbar. Die Einbindung physikalischer Gesetze in das Lösen der Rätsel ist genial und das verwenden der Portale einzigartig. Portal schafft es zu frustrieren um im nachhinein zu belohnen, bringt immer wieder neue Elemente des Levelaufbaus ein und lässt selbst nach dem spielen nicht los; Wie oft bin ich schon zur Arbeit gefahren und hab mir auf dem Weg den Kopf über die aktuelle Testkammer zerbrochen in der ich gestern Abend stecken geblieben bin. 


Charmant, Witzig, Intellekt fördernd: Portal 2

Ein "Muss"!
loco d+

Portal 2 is my favourite game of all time: full of unique puzzle mechanics, great graphics and story and humourous voice acting. A must for any casual gamer and highly recommended for fans of puzzle games. A little short but has great replay value and coop mode really adds to the enjoyment. Very different from anything else on the market and an all round upgrade to the first portal, which was already an excellent experience. A MUST-HAVE GAME

Excellent game! It was quite a challenge (and not just because I'm terrible with first person and almost died of motion sickness), one of the most original and clever games I played. Definitely recommended.

As a big fan of the original, this game was AWESOME. I absolutely love the apocalyptic art style, and the way it actually uses Tests from the original, but change them in appearance, so you have to look hard to see the signifagance. I also liked the multiple stages of Aperture. the way it goes from out of shape, to decaying and old, to repaired and new. Wheatley wasn't the best character in gaming, but as GLaDOS says, "YOU WERE DESIGNED TO BE A MORON!" In old Aperture, there are a few secret things to look for, I won't say what they are, if you wan't to find them, but I will give you some hints. 1: Not all doors are broken. 2: Look for portal surfaces, there may just be a few secrets... 3: Use the light bridges to your advantage, sometimes,you CAN get through that hole. As for the Co-op, it's as good quality as the game is too. GLaDOS is still sarcastically hilarious, You still get challenging tests, and you get to enjoy it with a friend! Or strangle them for dropping you into the oil. CURSE YOU NACHOCAT!!! Just kidding. but my overall ratong of this game is 10/10 5 stars.
Aivan mahtava tarina, haastavia puzzleja ja huvittavia hahmoja. Hauska loppu tarinalle niinkuin ekassa portalissakin.
Portal 2 has very realistic graphics, has tons of inenteresting content not seen in Portal, and has challenged me quite a lot.

Świetna gra, klasyk i jedyna w swoim rodzaju. O wiele lepsza, dłuższa i ładniejsza niż pierwsza część. Do tego ten humor i świetne dialogi sprawiają, że czasem warto się zatrzymać i poczytać zamiast rozwiązywać zagadki. Nie ma w tej grze ani jednego elementu, który by mnie drażnił czy zniechęcił. 
Po przejściu gry też jest sporo do roboty, jak np. plansze innych użytkowników, tworzenie własnych czy kooperacja. Polecam każdemu kto ma dobrą orientację w przestrzeni, lubi zagadki logiczne i chce się pośmiać. 10/10

Portal 2 co víc tomu říci ... Naprosto super bezvadná hra ... kdykoli si ji zahraju ,když jsem unuděnej smutnej....
Tak teď klady a zápory....
Klady:
+ Hru rozjede skoro kdokoli (sám mám na prd notebook a rozjede mi tam Antialising na 8x a MSAA 16x)
+ Dlouhá Singleplayerová kampaň
+ Super zábavná Co-op kampaň
+ Propracovanost úrovní
+ WorkShop (tím pádem hra se stává nekonečnou)
+ Editor map
+ Super ozvučení
+ Achiementy 
+ Prostě super hra
+ Aktivní hráči
Zápory : 
- Velmi málo ,ale tak i tak bugy (například bugování se ve výtahu)
- Glitche (zatím jsem našel 3 : Tunnel Flying , Střílení portálů skrz sklo a poslední střílení portálů skrz odstraňovač předmětů)
- Častěma jsem se zdál být batoletem když mě říkali co mám dělat i když v místnosti byla kostka a tlačítko + dveře

I really like this game! I'd recommend it to anyone that likes puzzle games. They're not just puzzles, you're stuck within a facility and you're being tested on. By the use of portals you try and find your way out. The storyline makes it so that it doesn't get boring! Some levels are frustrating, but once you've gone through them you usually facepalm yourself for not 'seeing it' sooner. Overall really fun to play!
Probably the best  and most innovative game i ever played,campaign is like playing through a movie, 10/10
Really fun.
awsome game, just sometimes you have to expect the unexpected

Sin duda uno de los juegos mas originales de los ultimos años. Sorprende de principio a fin, tanto por su trama, su humor o su jugabilidad. Si te gustan los Shooter y los puzzles, este es tu juego. Su multijugador cooperativo es realmente divertido y adictivo. Y tecnicamente está muy cuidado.
I love this game, mind blowing, really fun, and lots of maps both for single and multiplayer, worth buying!

SEHR GUTES SPIEL!

Valve, ihr kennt doch die Formel:
Zeit+Mühe= Gutes Spiel
Nun, ich bin wirklich BEEINDRUCKT!

Eure Singleplayer Story ist viel Vortgeschrittener, jedoch in persönlicher Meinung voller simpler "Tests". Außerdem gefallen mir die Syncronstimmen besonders gut! (Sagt Ellen McLain sie hatte die PERKETE STIMME!)

Die Multiplayer Funktion war besonderes überraschend! Knifflig, jedoch sehr gut im Thema "Balance zwischen Kniffligkeit und Spaß".

Meine ABSOLUTE Lieblings Feature in den Spiel ist der Workshop. Einfach zu wissen, dass man in sein Spiel seine Vorstellung von Kniffligen Tests veröffentlichen kann, ist WOW!


Ich würde das Spiel ein 9/10 geben.

Esto es un JUEGO lo demas son tonterias.
Pasa el tiempo y sigue siendo de lo mejor del mercado.

You are back in the Aperture Testing Labs after quite same time.
Once you'er thou the basic 'use WSAD to move' stuff you will find yourself in what appears to be the the room you slept in, but  with over 20 years of abandonedment.... because Aperture Lads was non-functional without GLaDOS(you shut down her in the first game).
You will hear a knock at the door along with the british voice of the lovable moronic Wheatle, its time for you to escape.

This is the game where coopritive testing is intodused
You and someone else have to test together in the chambers that is impossibale to solve alone.

Alot of test elements from the first game like cubes, buttons, deadly water, turret5,[spoiler]portals[/spoiler], and alot more make it into this game.(unfortinatly the High Energy Pellets don't appear in this game :/ )
The game also introduses alot of new testing elements like the Light Bridges, Lasers, Tractor Beam, gels, and alot more along with more cubes(and yes, the Companion cude too)!

Not only that, but later in the game, you explore ALOT more of Aperture 70's 80's and 90's test chambers.

This game also has a level editor! Whitch alows you to share your mind-burning puzzels with the world!

Challenge maps are back! Challenge mas let you play bits of the game with a goal, like being a cheapscape by placing the least amount of portals, or you could have a heart of a Speedrunner by completing a chamber in the least amount of time possibal. Your score will be public wouldwide. Coop also has challenge maps.

Its a good game in my opinion 8.9/10
Very fun recommend to anyone who wants to play a game! For only 19.99 this is AMAZING i could never imagine a game like  this!
muy bueno
